div.p: Peaceful, quiet, close to everything. That's what you'll experience living in The Homestead. The Homestead combines big city elegance with quaint small town charm. The Homestead features a vast array of home styles, from ranches to cape cods to colonials; one of which was created just for you. Don't miss out on the opportunity to become a part of this fabulous community. We would love to share our wonderful living experience with you.

A Great Location
• Easy access to 275 and 94
• 10 minutes from Metro Airport
• Just minutes from world class shopping, dining, recreation and entertainment

Elegant Exteriors
• Spectacular elevations with distinctive architectural designs
• Full range of color and material selections
• Brick on front elevation
• Covered front porch-per plan
• Concrete driveway and walkways
• Paved streets and sidewalks throughout
• Underground utilities
• City water and sewer
• Brass light fixtures
• Roll up sectional garage door
• Two exterior water spigots
• Maintenance free vinyl siding
• Aluminum gutters and downspouts

Luxurious Baths
• Separate soaking tub and shower in Master bath, Double sink - per plan
• One piece fiberglass tub/shower
• Single lever chrome faucets
• Ceramic floors and tub surround
• Laminate countertops
• Full width mirrors over vanity

Excellent Interiors
• Deluxe six panel painted colonist doors
• Premium O.G. door casings and base moldings
• Brass door hardware
• Custom quality painted trim
• 3/4" glued and nailed floors
• Carpeting throughout
• Armstrong#x00AE; Successor no-wax resilient vinyl flooring
• Hardwood flooring in foyer

Kitchens
• Aristocraft#x00AE; oak or pine cabinets
• Laminate countertops
• GE#x00AE; Potscubber dishwasher
• GE#x00AE; ductless range hood
• Spacious Pantry storage - per plan
• Garbage disposal
• Kitchen island - per plan

Energy Saving Features
• Insulated steel entry doors with full weatherstripping
• Foam sill sealer (basement)
• Double glazed vinyl windows
• Full insulation R-13 walls, R-30 ceilings
• 90% energy efficient furnace
• Tyvek house wrap

Electrical and Mechanical
• 150 amp circuit breaker electrical system
• Gas forced air furnace with central air prep
• Pre-selected lighting fixtures
• Recessed lights - per plan
• Cat 5 cable and telephone jacks
• Pre-wired for security system
• Pre-wired for garage door opener
• Dryer vent
• Gas or electrical service to dryer and range
• Smoke detector with battery backup to all levels
• Two exterior electrical outlets
• Bath exhaust fans
• 40 gallon high efficiency water heater
• Sump pump
• Door chime
